trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_SEQ_00<tab>Duimessand has need of an adventurer to deliver a message.

TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_SEQ_01<tab>Duimessand, a sentry stationed in northern Gridania, is long overdue to be relieved. However, his superior Millicent has yet to send a replacement. Seek her outside the Leatherworkers' Guild before Duimessand collapses from exhaustion.

TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_SEQ_02<tab>Duimessand warned you about Millicent's temper, but nothing could prepare you for the verbal barrage she delivered in response to his message. It seems Duimessand's watch has just begun...
TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_DUIMESSAND_000_1<tab>You there, adventurer! Could you deliver a message for me?
TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_DUIMESSAND_000_2<tab>My superior, Millicent, is stationed outside Atelier Fen<var 1F /var>Yll. She's doubtless busy, but I'm past due to be relieved.
TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_DUIMESSAND_000_3<tab>Long past due, truth be told. However, I can't simply abandon my post.
TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_DUIMESSAND_000_4<tab>Speak to her for me, would you? But choose your words wisely─she has a bit of a temper.
TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_MILLICENT_000_10<tab>What's all this about? Duimessand says he needs his break?

TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_MILLICENT_000_11<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>nerve<var 1A 01 /var> of that snivelin' little shite, cryin' for relief at a time like this! Has he already forgotten how shorthanded we are since that business with the Ixal the other day!?

TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_MILLICENT_000_12<tab>And sendin' a bloody unknown 'venturer to do his bleatin' no less! That self-servin' sod thinks only of his own woes, rubbin' his sore soles while welcomin' all manner of gil-grabbin' 'venturers into our holy wood. Useless bloody fool!

TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_MILLICENT_000_13<tab>Makes me blood boil, it does! ...Ah, but it's not you I should be givin' a piece of me mind to─you seem a decent enough sort, considerin'... Still, understand that it's our duty to keep an eye on <var 1A 02 /var>every<var 1A 01 /var> stranger that passes through these parts.
TEXT_SUBFST019_00049_MILLICENT_000_14<tab>Anyroad, I appreciate you lendin' an ear to my subordinate, damn fool that he is. Go on then, and stay out of trouble.
